-------- Original Message --------
Subject: seeds file not read and edited by heritrix
Date: Fri, 27 Jan 2006 20:20:16 +0100
From: Marco Baroni <baroni@...>
To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com

Dear All,

Today I tried my first Heritrix 1.6 crawl, but I was not able to start it
for the following reason (could not find relevant info in the faqs, user
manual, mailing list archive):

As I used to do with 1.4, I entered one seed in the seeds window when
creating the new job, and then, in the settings page, I entered the path to
my seeds file in the seeds box (replaxing the default seeds.txt). I use
this strategy this because I have 10,000 seeds, so it's impossible to just
paste them in the seeds window.

However, whenever I start the job, heritrix completes it immediately,
without processing anything. When I go looking for my seeds file, I find
that it is blank, or that it contains only the seed I manually entered via
the WUI interface.

Does anybody see what's wrong with my strategy, and/or could somebody
suggest what is the right way, in 1.6, to provide the seeds in a file,
rather than via the WUI?

Thanks in advance.

Regards,

Marco

-- 
Marco Baroni
SSLMIT, University of Bologna
